title: MCl gravimetric analysis - what happens to NO3-

content.prompt: During the course of the experiment, which of the following happens to the NO3- ions?

choices.label: They are decomposed by reacting with M+ ions.
They remain dissolved in the filtrate solution.

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
